special_text:
Read ahead [i](Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don’t trigger. Sacrifice after III.)[/i]
Create two 1/1 white Citizen creature tokens.
For each Citizen creature you control, you gain 1 life and put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
Exile this saga, then return it to the battlefield transformed under your control.

Whenever Union Organizers attacks, investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It’s an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
